fmea_data.Failure Mode: cooling fan response is real irregular and in some cases the system restarts automatically without resolving the overheating issue
fmea_data.Recommended Action: Implement preventive maintenance | Improve detection methods | Add monitoring systems
fmea_data.Original Text: During operation of CNC milling machine, the spindle motor immediately overheads despite normal load conditions. Temperatures sensor sometimes report delay or inconsistent readings and vibration level increases slightly before shutdown. Cooling fan response is real irregular and in some cases the system restarts automatically without resolving the overheating issue. There is no clear error code logged in the maintenance, data waste and past services records shown in consistent documentation. Please generate possible failure. Issues
